shlokas.text: अहं ब्रह्मास्मि (Aham Brahmasmi) — I am Brahman.
shlokas.meaning: Expression of identity with supreme consciousness.
shlokas.interpretation: Non-dual awareness where the individual self recognizes its unity with universal consciousness.

shlokas.meaning: Integration of senses into one intelligence.
shlokas.interpretation: Relates sensory processing into a coherent inner awareness, similar to multimodal learning.
